publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3235 Des McNulty on behalf of the Finance Committee: Budget Process (Written Agreements)—That the Parliament notes the three written agreements on the budgeting process between the Finance Committee and the Scottish Executive on the budgeting process (SP Paper 398) and agrees their terms.

S2M-3235 Des McNulty on behalf of the Finance Committee: Budget Process (Written Agreements)—That the Parliament notes the three written agreements on the budgeting process between the Finance Committee and the Scottish Executive on the budgeting process (SP Paper 398) and agrees their terms.
